overview: Relaxing Beach DVD - Bali Waves - Aerial View of Spectacular Bali Beaches and Waves with Sea and Ocean Sounds  See the beauty of Bali, an island of Indonesia in the Indian Ocean. Enjoy the ocean from many perspectives as you have never seen before. From high above the ocean, you can feel the impressive power of nature and marvel at the turquoise water.  The foaming waves are crashing in the rocks when they arrive at the beach. The sounds of the waves sound very powerful, yet still relaxing. Enjoy the picturesque look at the green vegetation together with the foaming waves and the blue water. The video ends with an incredible sunset where you can see the reflections of the last sunrays of the day in the ocean. It shows you the diversity of the Balinesian waves in the sun and also in dawn. Lean back and be a witness to the magic of nature.
title: Bali Waves
